titles.title: Expressing support for approximately doubling funding for Federal career and technical education programs.
Expressing support for approximately doubling funding for Federal career and technical education programs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the doubling of spending on programs under the Carl D. Perkins Career and Technical Education Act of 2006 and other innovative career and technical education programs over the next decade.
